pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Mozilla Tracking Protection Tools [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/mozilla/trackingprotection-tools.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/mozilla/trackingprotection-tools)A collection of tools for working with and analyzing Firefox's TrackingProtection.## Tools1. **DisconnectParser**: A python parser for the Disconnect Tracking Protection list.2. **DisconnectReporting**: A collection of tools to prepare and send tracking domain reports to Disconnect.
